mapper.select: select ID, PLAACE_ID, PEOPLE_ NUMBER, APPOINTMENT_TIME, CONTACT_ADDRESS, LINKMAN, CONTACT_NUMBER, ADD_TIME, ORDER_NUMBER, MEMBER from badmintonsystem.t_reserve_message where ID = #{id}
select ID, PLAACE_ID, PEOPLE_ NUMBER, APPOINTMENT_TIME, CONTACT_ADDRESS, LINKMAN, CONTACT_NUMBER, ADD_TIME, ORDER_NUMBER, MEMBER from badmintonsystem.t_reserve_message limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into badmintonsystem.t_reserve_message(PLAACE_ID, PEOPLE_ NUMBER, APPOINTMENT_TIME, CONTACT_ADDRESS, LINKMAN, CONTACT_NUMBER, ADD_TIME, ORDER_NUMBER, MEMBER) values (#{plaaceId}, #{people_ number}, #{appointmentTime}, #{contactAddress}, #{linkman}, #{contactNumber}, #{addTime}, #{orderNumber}, #{member})
mapper.update:
update badmintonsystem.t_reserve_message
PLAACE_ID = #{plaaceId},
PEOPLE_ NUMBER = #{people_ number},
APPOINTMENT_TIME = #{appointmentTime},
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{contactAddress},
LINKMAN = #{linkman},
CONTACT_NUMBER = #{contactNumber},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime},
ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNumber},
MEMBER = #{member},
where ID = #{id}
